---
title: "About Me"
---

I am a researcher in economics at Inra, the French Research Institute for Agriculture and the Environment. 
I am also a member of the Toulouse School of Economics and of the Institute for Advanced Studies in Toulouse. 
My main research areas are the econometric methods of causal inference, agro-environmental policies and education.
